definition: when the moment comes/at that time
to (a place)/until (a time)/up to/to go/to arrive/(verb complement denoting completion or result of an action)
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱們一起去看電影吧，到時候我來叫你。

sentences.english: I should know in a couple of days. I'll get back to you.
sentences.chinese: 過幾天我應當會知談，到時候再告訴你吧。

sentences.english: Which then becomes a terrific hallucinogen.
sentences.chinese: 到時候就會變成一種可怕的迷幻劑。

sentences.english: I can't open my eyes to watch you jumping into the fiery pit, for I will shut my eyes at the time.
sentences.chinese: 我不會眼睜睜看着你往火坑裏跳，到時候我會閉上的。

sentences.english: Tell him that there will be lots of food and he will rise to the bait .
sentences.chinese: 你告訴他到時候會有很多喫的，他會上鉤的。

sentences.english: We will be getting into that when the time comes.
sentences.chinese: 到時候我們會對此進行深入探討。

sentences.english: In time, all humans will join this rhythm with nature.
sentences.chinese: 到時候，所有物種將加入這大自然的律動中。

sentences.english: I’ll keep Friday night free and we can go then.
sentences.chinese: 我將把週五晚上騰出來，到時候我們就能去了。

sentences.english: Do you wanna come back for a swim later?
sentences.chinese: 那你想回來到時候一起游泳嗎？

sentences.english: Then I will go to pick you up at the airport. I will drive you to my home.
sentences.chinese: 到時候我會去機場接你，然後再坐車到我家。

sentences.english: Failure results in a bricked computer. Don't blame me.
sentences.chinese: 要不然失敗會導致計算機崩潰，到時候別責怪我。

sentences.english: I may relent somewhat when the time comes.
sentences.chinese: 到時候我也許會仁慈一些。

sentences.english: Your replacement will, by then, need your chamber.
sentences.chinese: 你的代替到時候就要你的房間了。

sentences.english: Then I will be like a fool who can speak neither Thai nor Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 到時候我可是一個既不會泰語也不會中文的傻瓜了。

sentences.english: We'll have closed our bank accounts by then.
sentences.chinese: 我們到時候巳經把賬戶關了。

sentences.english: I was in my room, lying down, when I heard loud explosions.
sentences.chinese: 聽到大爆炸到時候，我在自己的房間裏臥倒。
